New Records: Rhys Hoskins hit a grand slam, tying the franchise record for most grand slams in a season
Key Match Events: Rhys Hoskins' grand slam in the first inning gave the Brewers an early 4-0 lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' playoff hopes took a hit with the loss
Others: The game was the 100th meeting between the Brewers and Mets
